title: Azir lag in patch 7.9
body: After patch 7.9 I am experiencing ping spikes when I play Azir. This doesn't happen with any other character. Is anyone experiencing something similar?

replies.body: Since this is only happening with Azir, it kind of makes me think that something might be going wrong with his game files. Let's use our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) to do a quick "force repatch" to make sure nothing went wrong with the patch files.
